item.title: CVE-2022-36368|2024-08-03T10:00:04.407Z -- ipfire%20project -- ipfire
item.description: Multiple stored cross-site scripting vulnerabilities in the web user interface of IPFire versions prior to 2.27 allows a remote authenticated attacker with administrative privilege to inject an arbitrary script.
